title: Diamond Floral Locket Pendant - 'Puvvu Bottu'
features: This contemporary floral pendant features a delicate lattice of rose gold, each petal meticulously set with sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. The openwork design allows light to dance through the diamonds, maximizing their brilliance. The locket style offers a modern twist, perfect for holding a precious keepsake. This locket is Hyderabadi polished, ensuring longevity and luster.
occasions: or special celebrations. Can be styled with both traditional sarees and modern outfits. Suitable for any festive occasion.
description: A perfect blend of contemporary design and timeless elegance, this diamond locket pendant makes a meaningful and cherished gift. The exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability. Makes a statement of understated luxury.
